name: 2-in-1 Super Mario Bros. / Duck Hunt
desc: Embark on classic adventures as Mario, rescuing Princess Peach from Bowser's clutches, and then test their shooting skills by aiming at flying ducks in a thrilling hunting challenge.

name: 2-in-1 Super Spike V'Ball / Nintendo World Cup
desc: Experience the excitement of intense beach volleyball matches and fierce international soccer tournaments as they compete to become champions in both sports.

name: The 3-D Battles of WorldRunner
desc: Embark on a fast-paced intergalactic journey as Jack the WorldRunner, dodging obstacles and battling monstrous foes to save the universe from the evil Grax and rescue Princess Lela.

name: 3-in-1 Super Mario Bros. / Duck Hunt / World Class Track Meet
developer: Nintendo R&D4 / Intelligent Systems / Human Entertainment
desc: Enjoy a triple adventure, starting with Mario's quest to rescue Princess Peach, then testing their aiming skills in a duck hunting challenge, and finally, competing in various Olympic track events to achieve athletic glory.

name: 3-in-1 Super Mario Bros. / Tetris / Nintendo World Cup
developer: Nintendo R&D4 / Nintendo R&D1 / Technōs Japan
desc: Dive into a versatile gaming experience, where they can enjoy classic platforming adventures as Mario, engage in strategic puzzle-solving with Tetris, and participate in thrilling international soccer tournaments for a well-rounded gaming journey.

name: 8 Eyes
desc: Guide the knight Orin and his faithful falcon Cutrus on a perilous quest to retrieve eight mystical gems and thwart the nefarious plans of the evil King's eight guardians.

name: 10-Yard Fight
desc: Engage in an American football challenge, striving to lead their team to victory by navigating through opponents and scoring touchdowns within a 10-yard radius.
Take on the role of a skilled skateboarder navigating through various skate parks, mastering tricks, and avoiding obstacles to qualify for the ultimate skateboarding competition.
Pilot a World War II fighter plane, battling enemy forces in intense aerial combat to defeat the Imperial Japanese Navy and bring victory to the Allied forces.

name: 1943: The Battle of Midway
desc: Pilot a powerful World War II fighter plane, engaging in intense aerial combat over the Pacific Ocean to challenge the Japanese forces and lead their squadron to victory in the pivotal Battle of Midway.

name: A Boy and His Blob: Trouble on Blobolonia
desc: A young boy teams up with his jellybean-eating blob friend to journey to the distant planet Blobolonia, rescuing the kidnapped inhabitants from an evil emperor and restoring peace to the whimsical world.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
desc: Navigate through the nightmarish dream world, defeating Freddy Krueger's nightmarish minions and ultimately confronting the evil dream demon to save the Elm Street children from eternal terror.

name: Abadox: The Deadly Inner War
desc: Navigate through the insidious interior of the gigantic alien creature Abadox, facing gruesome adversaries and hazardous environments to rescue Princess Maria and put an end to the deadly inner conflict threatening the universe.

name: The Addams Family
desc: Step into the spooky world of the Addams family mansion, guiding Gomez through eerie landscapes and haunted hallways to rescue his kidnapped family members and thwart the evil plans of the sinister Dr. Gravely.

name: The Addams Family: Pugsley's Scavenger Hunt
desc: Join Pugsley and Wednesday on a thrilling scavenger hunt adventure through the eerie Addams mansion and creepy locales, solving puzzles and collecting items to save their beloved family members from an unknown danger.

name: Advanced Dungeons & Dragons: DragonStrike
desc: Embark on a heroic quest as dragon riders, battling monstrous creatures and ultimately facing the powerful dragon queen to save the land from impending doom.

name: Advanced Dungeons & Dragons: Heroes of the Lance
desc: Take control of a band of brave heroes, exploring treacherous dungeons, fighting fearsome monsters, and retrieving the dragonlance to defeat the evil dragon army and save the land of Krynn from darkness.

name: Advanced Dungeons & Dragons: Hillsfar
desc: Immerse in a medieval world, training skills, completing quests, and facing challenges to rise from a humble adventurer to a legendary hero in the bustling city of Hillsfar.

name: Advanced Dungeons & Dragons: Pool of Radiance
desc: Lead a party of heroes on a perilous journey through the city of Phlan, battling monsters, solving mysteries, and ultimately confronting the dark force emanating from the Pool of Radiance to restore peace to the realm.

name: Adventure Island
desc: Join the fearless Master Higgins on a tropical island adventure, running through treacherous terrains, defeating enemies, and rescuing his beloved Princess Leilani from the clutches of the evil witch doctor.

name: Adventure Island 3
desc: Embark on a thrilling expedition with Master Higgins, traversing diverse environments, overcoming formidable challenges, and battling powerful bosses to rescue his dinosaur friends and thwart the sinister plans of the evil Witch Doctor once more.

name: Adventure Island II
desc: Set out on another daring journey across dangerous islands, facing fierce enemies and overcoming treacherous obstacles to rescue Tina from the clutches of a malevolent alien invader.

name: Adventures in the Magic Kingdom
desc: Embark on a magical quest through various Disney-themed attractions, collecting silver keys and solving challenges to rescue six missing keys and prepare for an enchanting parade.

name: The Adventures of Bayou Billy
desc: Follow the daring journey of Billy West as he battles through the treacherous swamps of Louisiana, fights henchmen, and takes on challenging boss battles to save his kidnapped girlfriend Annabelle from the clutches of the evil gangster Godfather Gordon.

name: Adventures of Dino Riki
desc: Control the courageous young caveman Dino Riki as he ventures through prehistoric lands, defeating hostile creatures and bosses to rescue his beloved friends and restore peace to the ancient world.

name: The Adventures of Gilligan's Island
desc: Join the castaways from the famous TV show, guiding Gilligan through various island challenges, solving puzzles, and finding essential items to help all the characters escape the island and return home.

name: Adventures of Lolo
desc: Control the lovable blue ball-like character Lolo, navigating through numerous puzzle-filled rooms in a quest to rescue Princess Lala from the clutches of the evil King Egger and his minions.

name: Adventures of Lolo 2
desc: Lolo returns to embark on a challenging adventure across new puzzle-filled stages, utilizing his wits and strategic thinking to rescue Princess Lala once again from the clutches of the wicked Great Devil and his minions.

name: Adventures of Lolo 3
desc: Lolo sets out on another puzzle-solving adventure, exploring new lands, confronting challenging enemies, and employing clever tactics to rescue Princess Lala and her companions from the evil Empire and restore peace to the world of Eden.

name: The Adventures of Rad Gravity
desc: Join the quirky astronaut Rad Gravity, traveling through space to rescue fellow scientists from the clutches of an evil villain, all while combating extraterrestrial adversaries and navigating challenging worlds.

name: The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle and Friends
desc: Embark on a hilarious journey with Rocky the Flying Squirrel and Bullwinkle the Moose, solving puzzles and overcoming obstacles to thwart the nefarious plans of the sinister duo Boris and Natasha and rescue their friends from imminent danger.

name: Adventures of Tom Sawyer
desc: Accompany the mischievous young Tom Sawyer as he navigates through the picturesque town of St. Petersburg, Missouri, solving puzzles and avoiding obstacles on a quest to find hidden treasure and evade the clutches of the menacing Injun Joe.

name: Air Fortress
desc: Pilot a powerful spaceship, navigating through deadly aerial mazes, battling enemy forces, and infiltrating air fortresses to rescue captured scientists and liberate the galaxy from the oppressive Super Mech.

name: Back to the Future Part II & III
Balloon Fight
desc: Control a fearless Balloon Fighter, using their skills to pop enemy balloons and avoid hazards while soaring through the skies in a whimsical aerial battle.

name: Baseball
desc: Take on the role of a baseball team manager, strategizing lineups, making pitching decisions, and aiming for victory in thrilling virtual baseball matches.

name: Best of the Best: Championship Karate
Bill & Ted's Excellent Video Game Adventure
Bomberman
desc: Control the titular Bomberman, navigating through a maze of obstacles, planting bombs strategically to defeat enemies and ultimately save the world from the clutches of the evil Bomber Corps.

name: Bomberman II
desc: Embark on a thrilling adventure across multiple worlds, strategically planting bombs to defeat enemies, rescue the kidnapped Bomber Princess, and thwart the nefarious Black Bomberman's evil plans.

name: Break Time: The National Pool Tour
Bubble Bobble
desc: Control Bub and Bob, the adorable dragon brothers, as they venture through various colorful levels, trapping enemies in bubbles and striving to rescue their kidnapped friends, transforming them back into humans and restoring peace to their world.

name: Castlevania
desc: Take on the role of Simon Belmont, a vampire hunter armed with a whip, as he ventures through Dracula's haunted castle, defeating the dark creatures and confronting the infamous Count Dracula himself to save Transylvania from eternal darkness.

name: Castlevania II: Simon's Quest
desc: Guide Simon Belmont on an epic journey through Transylvania, collecting Dracula's body parts to break the curse and prevent the resurrection of the infamous vampire, Count Dracula.

name: Castlevania III: Dracula's Curse
desc: Control Trevor Belmont and his companions, Sypha, Grant, and Alucard, as they embark on a perilous quest to defeat Count Dracula and rid the world of his malevolent influence once and for all.

name: Circus Charlie
desc: Step into the shoes of Charlie, the talented circus performer, maneuvering through various challenging circus acts to entertain the audience and secure Charlie's place as the circus superstar.

name: Clu Clu Land
desc: Control Bubbles, the brave fish, as she embarks on an underwater adventure, strategically unearthing gold bars while avoiding enemies and uncovering hidden treasures to restore peace to the sea.

name: Contra
desc: Take on the roles of Bill and Lance, two elite soldiers on a dangerous mission to infiltrate the enemy's base, annihilate the evil Red Falcon organization, and save the world from an alien invasion.

name: Dash Galaxy in the Alien Asylum
Digger T. Rock: Legend of the Lost City
Donkey Kong 3
desc: Control Stanley the Bugman, using his bug spray to fend off swarms of bees and chase Donkey Kong away, protecting the flowers in his greenhouse from the mischievous ape's antics.

name: Donkey Kong Jr.
desc: Take on the role of Donkey Kong Jr., bravely venturing through perilous levels and overcoming obstacles to rescue his captive father, Donkey Kong, from the clutches of the wicked Mario.

name: Donkey Kong Jr. Math
desc: Join Donkey Kong Jr. in solving math problems by climbing vines and jumping on platforms, combining education and fun in a unique adventure.

name: Double Dragon
desc: Control Billy and Jimmy Lee, two skilled martial artists, on a mission to rescue Billy's kidnapped girlfriend, Marian, from the ruthless gang leader, Willy, unleashing their powerful combat skills to defeat waves of enemies and restore peace to the city.

name: Double Dragon III: The Sacred Stones
Duck Hunt
desc: Go on a duck hunting adventure, aiming to shoot down flying ducks and showcase sharpshooting skills in a classic hunting challenge using the NES Zapper.

name: Dungeon Magic: Sword of the Elements
Faria: A World of Mystery and Danger
Final Fantasy
desc: Embark on an epic quest with four heroes, journeying across vast lands, battling formidable monsters, and uncovering the mysteries behind the darkening crystals to save the world from impending doom.

The Flintstones: The Rescue of Dino & Hoppy
